name: A notebook
description:
Hi! Soooo this is my first game. It's really short (about 5 minutes) but I'm pround of that, at last it's my first try! I hope you enjoy it!

The game is about a lesbian girl who wants to escape with her girlfiend. The rest of the 'story' is in the game sooo I think I shoud stop saying things about the 'plot'.

Btw, have a nice day sweethearts

(made with Bitsy)
